name: Mega the Adventurer 2
description:
[PAGE IS WIP]

Mega the Adventurer 2 (as you probably guessed) is the sequel to the first Mega the Adventurer game, with 1+ years of development, this speedrun friendly game is short but has some replayability

Duke it out as Mega (also known as Mike) or Kyle (Unlocked after 3rd level) to beat your foes!

(NOTE:You may find some bugs and glitches here are there, so please make sure to report them, and do remember i'm a amateur in game develoment.)
